EXERCISE.question: How much aerobic exercise do you do on average each week? (running, walking, biking, hiking, etc.)

NUTRITION.question: How often do you eat home cooked meals with fresh vegetables?

SLEEP.question: How many hours of sleep do you get on average each night?

STRESS REDUCTION.question: I do mental renewal activities (e.g., walk in nature, meditation, yoga, tai chi)

ROUTINES.question: I go to sleep and wake up at consistent times
